sn46.20:1.1: “Sattime, bhikkhave, bojjhanga bhavita bahulikata ekantanibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattanti.
sn46.20:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, satta bojjhanga bhavita bahulikata ekantanibbidaya viragaya nirodhaya upasamaya abhinnaya sambodhaya nibbanaya samvattanti”ti.
